title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When opening a Java editor in Photon, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler does not display a popup menu for adding breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB: The expected behavior is that when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor in Photon, a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
